law.catch_line: An applicant for an initial license shall:...

text.section:
An applicant for an initial license shall:
file with the Commissioner an application on the form that the Commissioner provides; and
pay to the Commissioner an application fee of $200.

section.section: An applicant for a license shall submit to the Commissioner the information that the Commissioner considers reasonably necessary to determine, in accordance with this title, whether to issue a license to the applicant.
The application shall be executed under oath by the applicant or, if the applicant is not an individual, by an authorized officer of the applicant.
